articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Scientists, Technicians
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Scientists, Technicians
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the national meeting of scientists and technicians on Thursday.
					 Present there together with him were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, O Kuk Ryol, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Kim Yong Jin, Han Kwang Bok and chief secretaries of the WPK Provincial Committees.
					
					 Noting the national meeting of scientists and technicians offered an important occasion in turning the DPRK into a knowledge-based economic power by rapidly developing the science and technology of the country, he warmly congratulated the participants on the successful meeting charged with a high degree of enthusiasm before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the scientists and technicians would bear in mind their mission entrusted by the Party and the country and greatly contribute to accelerating the building of a socialist thriving nation and demonstrating the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea with scientific and technological achievements.
					
					 All the participants pledged themselves to devotedly work for the country's scientific and technological development in line with the WPK's policy of attaching importance to science and technology, well aware of the deep trust of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Spokesman for NDC Policy Department of DPRK Slams Park Geun Hye's Sophism during Her Foreign Trip
articles.content:
NDC Policy Department of DPRK Slams Park Geun Hye's Sophism during Her Foreign Trip
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) released a statement on Thursday denouncing the foreign trip made by Park Geun Hye during which she revealed her true colors as a despicable sycophant and traitor and maniac keen on confrontation with compatriots.
					 Recalling that she visited West European countries from Nov. 2 to 9 in the wake of her junkets to the U.S. and other foreign countries as soon as she took office as puppet south Korean president, the statement said:
					
					 Park again shouted herself hoarse for the DPRK's "dismantlement of nukes" during her trips to West European countries.
					
					 Nukes and missiles of the DPRK serve as strong forces deterring the U.S. from inflicting a nuclear disaster upon the former and treasured swords for self-defence to protect the destiny of the country and compatriots.
					
					 Sovereignty and dignity are dearer than the destiny of a nation.
					
					 In this sense, the demand that the DPRK should dismantle its nukes and missiles is, in the final analysis, little short of forcing it to give up its sovereignty and dignity to be a slave of imperialism.
					
					 The same can be said of such words as "right option" and "genuine change" uttered by Park.
					
					 What the DPRK wishes for is by no means the U.S.-style market economy based on showy U.S.-style democracy or logic of jungle law.
					
					 The road to be covered by the DPRK is the one characterized by its independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in defence, the path of giving top priority to the interests of the nation.
					
					 It is the most right option and genuine change desired by all compatriots to map out policies as required by the road and carry out them in practice.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK as ever independently settle the issues related to the north-south relations on the principle of placing the nation above all and attaching importance to it.
					
					 It is none other than Park Geun Hye who should make a right option and work for genuine peace.
					
					 Prior to her trip to West European countries, she even talked about "north-south summit" in a bid to improve her image.
					
					 She pretended to be concerned for the detente on the Korean Peninsula and the prospect of the inter-Korean relations. However, it only revealed her vulgar personality.
					
					 North-south summit serves as an important occasion in achieving the unity of the nation and a lever for realizing peaceful reunification.
					
					 It is quite natural that good remarks favorable for the interests of the nation cannot be heard from her as she has such a wrong way of thinking as considering hostility as "confidence" and confrontation as "principle." 
					
					 Park clearly revealed her nature as an ugly sycophant and traitor and maniac keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen not only during her visit to the U.S. in May prior to her recent tour of West European countries but also during her junkets to a neighboring country and Southeast Asian countries.
					
					 Such anachronistic act of treachery as clinging to coattails of foreign forces, her back turned on the nation, will only result in wringing her neck herself.
					
					 Availing itself of this opportunity, the Policy Department of the NDC of the DPRK once again serves the following strong warning to Park and her group: 
					
					 First, they should not dare utter words about the nukes of the DPRK and its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force any longer.
					
					 Their vociferous talking about those matters as dictated by their American master would only add to the thrice-cursed crimes committed by them as sycophants and traitors and maniacs keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 They should know well that no one is more miserable than those political servants dancing to the tune of others, bereft of their own senses.
					
					 Second, they should not behave impudently in a bid to lead someone to "changes".
					
					 We watch thriving DPRK on the horizon. We are realizing all the dreams full of confidence, which the nation and the fellow countrymen have desired to bring into reality, along the path of our own choice.
					
					 It is not us but Park and her followers stuck in the mire of "yusin" that should make "changes."
					
					 Park should bear in mind that the south Korean people, too, have long worked hard to transform south Korean society into the one of justice, opposed to the road of sycophancy and treachery.
					
					 Third, if she wants to build confidence and receive the treatment as "head of state," she should come to her senses and properly behave.
					
					 It is said that treatment of one depends on his or her behavior.
					
					 Park should know that genuine confidence can be built only when she respects all the north-south joint declarations and agreements reached according to them, common achievements of the nation, before grumbling about someone's  "breaking of promise" and good treatment would be accorded only when she stops deliberately speaking ill of someone.
					
					 Park and her group had better come to their senses, though belatedly.
					
					 Our army and people will closely watch their future attitude.

articles.title: DPRK Refutes False Rumor about Its Involvement in Military Operations in Syria
articles.content:
DPRK Refutes False Rumor about Its Involvement in Military Operations in Syria
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Thursday as regards the false rumor about its  involvement in military operations in Syria:
					 Some foreign media are floating misinformation that the DPRK supplied war equipment to Syria, its airmen are directly involved in air-raids on insurgent troops in Syria, etc.
					
					 This is nothing but part of the foolish plots of the hostile forces to tarnish the image of the peace-loving  DPRK and cover up their criminal acts of blocking the peaceful settlement of the Syrian situation.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK that the Syrian situation should be settled peacefully through dialogue and negotiations as early as possible in the interests of the Syrian people free from foreign intervention on the principle of ensuring sovereignty and territorial integrity.

articles.title: S. Korea's Principal Plan for Development of Inter-Korean Relations under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Principal Plan for Development of Inter-Korean Relations under Fire 
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 1051 on Thursday denouncing the south Korean authorities' "second principal plan for the development of the south-north relations".
					 The south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification recently submitted the "second principal plan for the development of the south-north relations" to the "National Assembly". It is said that the plan is the "policy toward the north" the present regime will pursue for five years to come.
					
					 The plan considers it as its main task to "find a solution to the nuclear issue of the north" and is peppered with disturbing matters like the institution of "a law on human rights in the north" and "support to defectors from the north". Missing in the plan are issues of setting up a special zone for peace and cooperation in the West Sea, replacing the armistice system with a peace mechanism, etc. which were contained in the first plan worked out during the Roh Moo Hyun regime in 2007. This brought into bolder relief the real intention of the present regime to confront with the DPRK to the end during its tenure of office, the information bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 Deleted from the second plan are all matters related to implementing the October 4 declaration and included in it are the "nuclear issue" and "human rights issue", a total denial of the inter-Korean declarations and an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The second plan is not for developing the inter-Korean relations but for severing the ties and escalating confrontation. 
					
					 The puppet group mentioned in the plan "the issue of resuming economic cooperation between the south and the north and examining the allowance of investment in the north." This is, however, nothing but a deceptive artifice to escape the criticism of the group by public at home and abroad.
					
					 It is a mockery of public at home and abroad to talk about the development of inter-Korean relations, severing all ties between the north and the south and frantically seeking confrontation and war. 
					
					 The puppet regime should totally nullify the above-said extremely disturbing plan and decisively roll back its policy of confrontation with compatriots. 
					
					 It will not be able to escape the same shameful destruction as what traitor Lee Myung Bak met, if it persists in its moves to escalate the confrontation despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a message of greeting to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the proclamation of the State of Palestine.
					 The message wished the Palestinian president good health and the Palestinian people new success in carrying out their just cause to build an independent state with East Kuds as its capital.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets New Congolese Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets New Congolese Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Daniel Owassa, new Congolese ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Checking Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Checking Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Many years have passed since the end of the "yusin" dictatorship in south Korea. But the era of such nightmare is coming back there, a very ill-boding development, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 Looking back on history, after his seizure of power at the point of bayonet under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. the "yusin" dictator declared anti-communism as a "state policy," blustering that his final goal was to "liquidate pro-communists." He facilitated the fascistization of society, turning the whole of south Korea into a veritable hell and prison without bars. The "yusin" dictator, who earned an ill-fame as a fascist hangman without an equal, left no means untried to dampen the desire of the people and seek long-term office.
					
					 As soon as she came to power, the present chief executive copied the ruling methods of the "yusin" dictator, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet conservative group employed sleight of hand to get rid of the crisis caused by the case of the Intelligence Service's (IS) interference in the "presidential" election, while crying out for "stop to partisan strife" and "people's living." At the same time, it passed a motion calling for judgment aimed to disorganize the Unified Progressive Party through the puppet State Council meeting under the pretext of "preserving the nature."
					
					 The authorities are also shouting themselves hoarse for "preserving the basic order of liberal democracy."
					
					 The case of the  IS's interference in the election, the fabrication of the attempted rebellion and the resultant frantic racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" are sparking off bitter rebuff and protest among south Koreans from all walks of life. These are just a few typical examples proving that south Korean society has returned to the erstwhile "yusin" dictatorial system.
					
					 The history of shuddering fascist dictatorship should never be allowed to repeat itself in south Korea. Absolutely unpardonable are the puppet forces intensifying their fascist dictatorial rule, swimming against the trend of the times toward independence, democracy and reunification and against the south Koreans' desire.

articles.title: North-South Ties Can Never Improve As Long As S. Korean Regime Clings to "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
articles.content:
North-South Ties Can Never Improve As Long As S. Korean Regime Clings to "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The north-south ties can never thaw as long as the south Korean puppet regime clings to the "theory of adhering to principle", says a commentator's article of Rodong Sinmun Thursday.
					 It is self-contradictory for the regime to openly speak of "adhering to principle" while trumpeting about "the process of building confidence on the Korean Peninsula", the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The principle to be adhered to by the north and the south is the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--and the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great reunification programmes in the new century.
					
					 The three principles and the idea are the only common principles to be held fast to by the north and the south and there can never be any other principle away from them.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have true intent to build confidence and improve the relations with the north, they should not cling to the absurd "theory of adhering to principle" but opt for implementing the north-south joint declarations as soon as possible as desired by all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 The "theory of adhering to principle" will never work on anyone and will bring only a shameful ruin.
					
					 Should the puppet regime keep clinging to the "theory of adhering to principle" defying the warnings of the DPRK and denunciation at home and abroad, it can never be able to evade the miserable end and curses by the history and nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Reactionary Nature of S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Reactionary Nature of S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday carries a commentator's article revealing the contents and essence of "theory of adhering to principle", anti-reunification sophism which the south Korean authorities set as their north policy.
					 The article says as follows:
					
					 The theory is an anti-reunification one, in every aspect, as it totally denies the June 15 north-south declaration with an aim to turn the north-south relations back to the era of confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime, describing the north-south relations as "abnormal relations of humiliation" in which the south submits to the north, being pulled by it, is now calling for setting the "principle" to turn those relations back to "normal ones".
					
					 There is no doubt that by the "abnormal relations" the regime meant the north-south relations that made favorable development after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The relations between the north and the south have now been brought to naught with everything broken down and cut off due to the puppet regime's hideous confrontational moves.
					
					 It is the first time since the end of the Korean war that the north-south ties witnessed even the exchange of fire and the extreme tensions where a nuclear war is imminent, which seriously threaten the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The puppet regime's call for turning the north-south ties to "normal" from "abnormal" is anachronistic anti-reunification sophism to end the June 15 era of reunification and bring back the era of confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' "theory of adhering to principle" is a criminal theory of stand-off between social systems which fundamentally denies the reunification-oriented nature of the north-south ties and promotes division and show-down.
					
					 The north-south ties are not country to country relations but special relations of tentative nature between the people of one nation orientating toward reunification.
					
					 It is out of this purport that the north and the south have jointly confirmed the nature of the bilateral ties and the principle, norms and orders based on it long ago.
					
					 The north-south declarations comprehensively specify the principles and ways for developing the north-south relations and achieving peaceful reunification and prosperity common to the nation.
					
					 There are no unilateral principle and international standard other than the standard, principle and norms jointly agreed upon by the north and the south. Furthermore, the concept of "normal state-to-state relations" is absolutely unimaginable.
					
					 The theory of the "normal state-to-state relations consistent with international standard" touted by the puppet regime is just a replica of the criminal theory of "two Koreas" claimed by the "yusin" dictator.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' "theory of adhering to principle" is a dangerous theory of confrontation between fellow countrymen aimed to destroy peace, escalate tension and ignite a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The puppet regime set "hard-line" and "pressure" as another "principle concerning the north" while crying out for "firm security posture", "solid south Korea-U.S. alliance" and "strong deterrence against the north" in its moves to provoke a new war.
					
					 "Security" and "deterrence against the north" clamored by the puppet warmongers are just pronoun of military confrontation and war moves, a camouflage to cover up their aggression nature.
					
					 It is absolutely illogical for them to spell out such rhetoric as "nuclear threat" and "provocation" by the north as they only seek to find pretexts to launch invasion of the north.
					
					 The regime connives at and defends the U.S. nuclear weapons and war moves. Yet, it speaks ill of the just nuclear deterrence possessed by the fellow countrymen in the north. This is just like a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 The present regime only plunged the north-south ties into a deadlock and increased the danger of a war through war moves against the DPRK, anti-DPRK smear campaign and crackdown on the reunification movement forces after taking power.
					
					 All facts prove that the "theory of adhering to principle" touted by the puppet regime is the traitorous theory of sycophancy toward the U.S., theory of confrontation with fellow countrymen and theory of war against the north.
					
					 It goes without saying that the north-south relations can never develop as long as the puppet regime keeps the "theory of adhering to principle".
					
					 The three principles of national reunification and the idea of "By our nation itself" are the only principle to be held fast by the north and the south and there can never be any other principle away from the three principles and the idea.

articles.title: S. Korea's "Theory of Adhering to Principle" Is Theory of Confrontation of Social Systems
articles.content:
S. Korea's "Theory of Adhering to Principle" Is Theory of Confrontation of Social Systems
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A commentator's article of Rodong Sinmun Thursday denounces the south Korean authorities' "theory of adhering to principle" as a criminal theory of escalating confrontation between social systems which fundamentally denies the reunification-oriented nature of the north-south ties and pursues division and stand-off.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 By calling for "normal state-to-state relations consistent with international standard" the puppet regime claims that it is "the consistent stand of the government to make the south-north relations those of normal state-to-state relations". It even openly speaks out that the "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" is aimed to make "south-north relations consistent with international standard".
					
					 This is a traitorous remark fundamentally denying the reunification-oriented nature of the north-south ties.
					
					 The north-south ties are not country to country relations but special relations that are formed temporarily between the north and the south in the course of orientating toward becoming one.
					
					 International standard and norms which are generally applied to relations between countries can not work on the relations between the north and the south.
					
					 It is for this reason that the north and the south jointly confirmed the nature of the bilateral ties and the principle, norms and orders based on it long ago.
					
					 The north-south joint declarations, in particular, comprehensively specify principles and ways for improving the north-south ties and achieving the peaceful reunification and the prosperity common to the nation.
					
					 There can never be any unilateral principle and international standard as regards the north-south ties, other than the standard, principle and norms jointly agreed upon by the north and the south, and the concept of "normal state-to-state relations" are unimaginable.
					
					 However, the puppet authorities are talking about "international standard" and "normal state". This is aimed to make the north-south ties a plaything of outsiders and the issue of international dispute and escalate anti-DPRK racket in a bid to realize the dream of "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption".
					
					 The "theory of normal state-to-state relations consistent with international standard" touted by the puppet regime is just a replica of the criminal theory of "two Koreas" called for by the "yusin" dictator.
					
					 The puppet regime malignantly slanders the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system in the DPRK and even uses human scum in its racket for escalating confrontation and breeding plots against the DPRK allegedly to lead it to "change".
					
					 The regime is speaking in public of creating "world peace park" in the Demilitarized Zone (DMZ) along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) but this is just a trick to keep Korea divided for an indefinite period and abuse the DMZ as an "area of confrontation under peace veil".
					
					 It is shame of the nation that its land remains divided by the MDL drawn by outsiders. But the south Korean regime is mulling turning the DMZ into "park" and make money by allowing foreign tourists in. This arouses great indignation.
					
					 The theory of "normal state-to-state relations" clamored by the puppet regime is hideous traitorous sophism revealing its anti-reunification and confrontational nature.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Adhering to Principle" Is Theory of War against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Adhering to Principle" Is Theory of War against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities' "theory of adhering to principle" is a dangerous theory of confrontation with compatriots in the north, a theory of war of aggression against the north aimed to harass peace, escalate tensions and ignite a war on the Korean Peninsula, says a commentator's article of Rodong Sinmun Thursday.
					 The article says:
					
					 The puppet regime of south Korea put forward "hard-line" and "pressure" as another "principle to be adhered to in dealing with the north" while calling for "firm security posture", "solid south Korea-U.S. alliance" and "strong deterrence against the north" in its bid to provoke a new war.
					
					 "Security" and "deterrence against the north" touted by the puppet warmongers are just the pronoun for military confrontation and war moves and it is just a trick to cover up their aggressive nature.
					
					 They are talking about "nuclear threat" and "provocation" by the north while getting desperate in their moves to provoke a war. This is sophism that can never work on others.
					
					 The puppet regime argues that "the north must be prevented from using nukes". Even a mere child knows that it is a crafty trick to invade the north by forcing it to disarm itself.
					
					 The regime is taking issue with the just nuclear deterrence of the north while defending the nuclear weapons and nuclear war moves of the U.S. This is like a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 The present south Korean conservative forces' nuclear war racket against the DPRK far surpasses that of the Lee Myung Bak regime of traitors in its reckless and dangerous nature.
					
					 It is the south Korean present regime which frequently brings more nuclear war means to south Korea and in its vicinity, turning those areas into exhibition of the U.S. nuclear weapons and theatre of anti-DPRK nuclear saber-rattling. It is also the present regime which has actively pursues the U.S. nuclear war moves.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak signed with the U.S. the war scenario dubbed "nuclear posture" to go under his master's "nuclear umbrella". The present group of conservatives adopted "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed at "preemptive nuclear attack" on the north and even joined the U.S. missile defense system by soliciting it for cooperation.
					
					 When atmosphere of detente was temporarily created on the Korean Peninsula thanks to the DPRK's peace-loving efforts for dialogue, the puppet regime clung to the coattail of its U.S. master, begging it not to get embroiled in the north's "tactics for engaging the U.S. and blocking south Korea" but "steadily put across consistent and clear message".
					
					 The regime even solicited for international cooperation against the north in several foreign countries while kicking up unprecedented racket of suppressing "forces following the north" in south Korea as part of its fascist suppression whirlwind for stamping out democratic and progressive forces, thereby stunning the world.
					
					 After taking power the present regime has done nothing but plunging north-south ties into a deadlock and increased the danger of war through anti-DPRK war moves and smear campaign and the crackdown on the reunification movement forces.
					
					 All facts prove that the "theory of adhering to principle" touted by the puppet regime is the revised version of the theory of sycophancy toward the U.S., theory of confrontation with fellow countrymen and the theory of war against the north.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Regime's Traitorous Acts
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Regime's Traitorous Acts 
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet authorities favored and recognized Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense", touching off the surging indignation of Koreans. 
					 The south Korean authorities' support for Japan's exercise of the right is the tacit connivance at the past war crimes of the Japanese imperialists and an open support for Japan's ambition for reinvasion. 
					
					 This is an insult to all the Koreans who suffered disgrace by the Japanese imperialist brutes and a traitorous act volunteering to play the role of lackey of the aggressors. 
					
					 The history of the Japanese imperialists' aggression of Korea is not an old tale. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Koreans as they oppressed innocent and barehanded Koreans at the point of bayonet, plundered Korea of its natural resources and deprived Koreans of their names. 
					
					 Still running bitter and deep is the grudge of Korean women who were forced into sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.  Japan is a war criminal state that was fattened up by the blood of Koreans but it still openly eulogizes the masterminds of aggression, far from making an apology and reparation. To join hands with such a country is an act little short of abandoning to be Koreans.
					
					 Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" is now arousing serious concerns of the international community as it is part of the moves to realize the shattered old dream of the Japanese militarists to realize the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere". 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea keeps mum about Japan's history of aggression and moves to grab Korea's territory which left lasting regret to the Korean nation. It even unhesitatingly joins outside forces in their war moves for aggression against the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 In the treacherous acts of the Park Geun Hye group surpassing by far the five traitors of 1905 the Koreans see the revival of the "yusin" dictator, pro-Japanese traitor and "the last soldier of the Imperial Japanese Army" who signed with blood a pledge of "loyalty to the emperor of Japan".
					
					 The Koreans will never pardon the traitorous acts of the puppet forces obsessed with the idea of sycophancy and submission to Japan to the marrow of their bones.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Move to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Move to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan Denounced
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Nov. 12 carried an article contributed by Ko Yong Dae, permanent researcher at the institute for peaceful unification studies, denouncing the puppet regime for working hard to conclude a military agreement with Japan.
					 The article accused the south Korean authorities of contemplating holding vice defense minister-level talks with Japan on Nov. 13 to re-discuss the issue of concluding a military agreement.
					
					 The military agreement to be concluded with Japan would help carry out the joint operation with main emphasis on preemptive attack on the north and MD and ensure mutual logistic support and thus back Japan's full exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" and form a triangular military alliance, the article noted. 
					
					 This means south Korea being a subject to Japan in information, operation, logistics and other fields soon, it added.
					
					 Whether the present regime concludes the military agreement with Japan or not will be a touchstone showing whether it has the will to react to Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" or not, the article stressed.

articles.title: U.S. Economic Sanctions Are Breach of International Law: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Economic Sanctions Are Breach of International Law: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- U.S. harsh economic sanctions against various countries are a breach of international law, observes Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 "Treaty on Definition of Aggression" which was adopted and came into force in the 1930s and a series of international treaties and resolutions stipulate it as an act of aggression and violation of international law to encroach upon the sovereignty and economic independence of other countries, put economic pressure to them to threaten the foundation of their economic arteries and apply economic blockade against them, the article notes.
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that the U.S. is slapping protracted economic sanctions against various countries, finding fault with their building of an independent new life and their social systems.
					
					 The U.S. is using sanctions as a main lever for forcing other countries to introduce American-style "view on value" and "democracy" and making them bound to the neo-colonial ruling system, the article points out, and goes on:
					
					 Such practices of the U.S. and other Western forces are quite contrary to the spirit of the UN Charter which calls for promoting economic and social progress of all people in establishing international relations.
					
					 The sanctions the U.S. imperialists are applying against the DPRK are unprecedented in history in their protracted nature and scope, and most harsh and base in their application. These sanctions are a product of the U.S. policy for stifling the DPRK and unethical and inhuman crimes to block the existence of the Korean people and the development of high civilization.
					
					 The U.S. should unconditionally lift the illegal and unreasonable sanctions.

articles.title: DPRK Supports Cause of Palestinians, Arabs
articles.content:
DPRK Supports Cause of Palestinians, Arabs
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate made a speech during the discussion of the agenda item "Report of Ad Hoc Committee for Investigating Israel's Human Rights Abuses against Palestinians and Other Arabs in the Occupied Territories" at the meeting of the 4th Committee of the 68th UN General Assembly on Nov. 8.
					 He accused Israel of ceaselessly abusing the human rights of the Palestinians and other Arabs despite the fact that the international community is making sustained efforts with deep concern to settle the Mideast issues, citing facts to expose them.
					
					 These acts have gone to such pass that they are leading to military attacks to infringe upon the rights and territorial integrity of sovereign countries, he said, and went on:
					
					 Israel's infringement upon sovereignty and human rights abuses are becoming more blatant under the U.S. patronage. 
					
					 It is an urgent issue to settle the Mideast issues including the Palestinian issue as soon as possible.
					
					 The Mideast issues should be settled in the interests of the Palestinians and other Arabs as required by international law and relevant UN resolutions.
					
					 As demanded by the international community, Israel should withdraw from all occupied Arab territories and pay due compensation for all mental and material damage done to the Arabs including the Palestinians, first of all. 
					
					 Only then can the Palestinian issue be settled in the interests of the Palestinians who are directly concerned.
					
					 Availing itself of this opportunity, the DPRK once again sends support and solidarity to the Palestinians in their just cause of retaking their national rights including the founding of an independent state with East Kuds as its capital and to the Arabs in their struggle to seek a peaceful and fair solution to the Mideast issues.

articles.title: Guinea to Steadily Boost Friendly, Cooperative Ties with DPRK
articles.content:
Guinea to Steadily Boost Friendly, Cooperative Ties with DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Guinean President Alpha Conde met DPRK Ambassador to Guinea Kim Jun Gap on November 9.
					 The president said:
					
					 I sincerely congratulate the Korean people on their great successes made in the efforts to build a thriving nation and improve the people's standard of living under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The friendly relations between Guinea and the DPRK have a long history.
					
					 In the past period the DPRK sincerely helped the Guinean people in their efforts to build new society.
					
					 It is my hope that these good friendly and cooperative relations would grow stronger.
					
					 We sincerely hope the Korean people would achieve the peaceful reunification of the country in their interests.

articles.title: DPRK Marathoner Wins Gold Medal
articles.content:
DPRK Marathoner Wins Gold Medal
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Kim Hye Gyong placed first in the half marathon of the 2013 Singapore Women's Race.
					Another runner Kim Hye Song placed second. They are twin sisters. The players returned home on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobats Return
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobats Return
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK acrobats returned home on Thursday after participating in the 14th Wuqiao International Acrobatics Festival.

articles.title: KCNA Delegation Returns
articles.content:
KCNA Delegation Returns
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Central News Agency headed by Vice Director General Ri Ho Gyu returned home on Thursday after visiting China.
					 It was greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Ri Chun Gun, vice director general of the KCNA, and Tu Jingchang, counselor of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: Legends about Mt. Chilbo (3)
articles.content:
Legends about Mt. Chilbo (3)
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- There are two caves called Taejang (general) and Chonchi (idiot) on the way up to Sochaek Peak standing in Inner Chilbo of Mt. Chilbo.
					 The caves tell about a legend well known among the local people.
					
					 Once upon a time, there lived two boys of genius, called Choe Ho and Ri Ho, in a village near the mountain.
					
					 Nearing the age of twenty, they had to leave their homes with a lot of books for the caves in Inner Chilbo to apply themselves to studies for three years, as wished by their parents.
					
					 They occupied the caves, the upper one for Choe majoring in literature and the lower one for Ri in military affairs.
					
					 It happened a few days before the end of their three-year-long self-study that a tiger appeared in the lower cave. But Ri remained unflinching to let the tiger back out with fear.
					
					 When the tiger came in the other cave, Choe, astounded by it, could do nothing but seeking hiding place.
					
					 Next day, Ri happened to see a pretty woman who said she was wandering about the valley after losing her way to home.
					
					 Ri yielded his cave to her and continued his training outside the cave all night.
					
					 Choe, too, met in his cave a pretty woman who said she was a daughter of a fisherman. Tempted by her, he bedded her.
					
					 After waking up late in the morning, he saw a red fruit which he thought the woman left for him, and swallowed it at a gulp.
					
					 The appearance of the tiger and the woman for two consecutive nights was not a contingent happening. It was a stiff test conducted by the deity of Mt. Chilbo to look into the will of the two men. 
					
					 After that Choe became an idiot and Ri a general.
					
					 Since then, the lower cave has been called Taejang Cave and the other cave Chonchi Cave.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' "Theory of Adhering to Principle" Rebuffed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' "Theory of Adhering to Principle" Rebuffed 
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The "theory of adhering to the principle" touted by the south Korean authorities is an anti-reunification theory as it totally denies the June 15 joint declaration  and is intended to  bring the inter-Korean relations back to the era of confrontation, observes  Rodong Sinmun Thursday in its lengthy commentator's article.
					 It says: The south Korean puppet group claims that the relations between the north and the south have been so far the ties in which the south was pulled by the north and "abnormal relationship" in which the south was subject to submission and humiliation, adding it is what it calls the principle to replace those relations by a "normal relationship."
					
					 Needless to say, by "abnormal relations" the group means the inter-Korean relations that had favorably developed after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It is the contention of the south Korean authorities that the adoption of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration by the top leaders of the north and the south was abnormal and it was abnormal happenings that in the wake of rejoining the road and railway links and blood ties after more than half a century, many compatriots from the north and the south visited each other, sharing compatriotic feelings and demonstrating the will for reunification.
					
					 They insist that the north and south's joint confirmation of the idea of "By our nation itself" meant the south's implication in the strategy of the north, the agreement to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity was to serve the purpose of the north, their agreement on setting up a special zone for peace and cooperation in the West Sea meant the south's yielding to the north and operations in the Kaesong Industrial Zone and tour of Mt. Kumgang meant a "drain on resources".
					
					 The puppet group went on such rampage as opening to public of the minutes of north-south summit talks, not content with persecuting the former "presidents" who signed the historic inter-Korean declarations and driving one of them to death.
					
					 If the eye-opening development of the inter-Korean relations, a product of the June 15 era, should have been considered as "abnormal" development though it brought so strong hope for reunification and joy to all fellow countrymen and was welcomed by the whole world, what is "normal" development claimed by the group?
					
					 All issues concerning the inter-Korean relations have been put into confusion and they have virtually collapsed due to the group's heinous confrontation moves.
					
					 There were skirmishes between the north and the south for the first time since the Korean War and the danger of a nuclear war has reached its height, extremely threatening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Does the puppet group mean its moves for making fellow countrymen stand in confrontation and fight each other as now "normal" inter-Korean relations?
					
					 Why does it dislike the north and the south getting reconciled and living in harmony and why does it interpret this as "abnormal"?
					
					 It was thanks to the June 15 joint declaration that the present south Korean chief executive could visit Pyongyang in 2002. Was it "abnormal" and did she suffer humiliation, pulled by the north?
					
					 The south Korean regime's claim that the inter-Korean relations should make a switchover to "normal relations" from "abnormal" ones is, in the final analysis, nothing but anachronistic anti-reunification sophism intended to bring the June 15 era of reunification to that of confrontation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Committing Illegal Acts during Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Committing Illegal Acts during Election
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- At least one hundred personages of civic and social organizations, religious and political circles of south Korea held a joint meeting at the Sejong Cultural Center in Seoul on Tuesday in protest against the puppet authorities' illegal and fraudulent acts during the election.
					 They called for conducting special inspection for probing the truth behind the case of interference in the election by the Intelligence Service (IS) and other power organs and firing Kim Ki Chun, presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae, Nam Jae Jun, director of the IS, and Hwang Kyo An, minister of Justice.
					
					 They underscored the need to escalate the movement for issuing declarations on the situation and the signature campaign into ones to be participated in by people of all social standings across south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Obstructing Investigation into Illegal Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Obstructing Investigation into Illegal Acts 
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Federation for Economic Justice of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 11 in protest against the south Korean puppet authorities' obstruction of the investigation into the illegal interference in the election by power organs. 
					 Speakers at the press conference chided the chief executive for refusing to express regret or apology for the organized interference in the election by power bodies. 
					
					 On the contrary she is pressurizing the prosecutors in charge of the investigation into the case in every way and even dismissed some of them, the speakers charged, adding:
					
					 Moreover, the chief executive has not taken any measure against the minister of Justice and the director of the Intelligence Service and other arch criminals who downplayed the investigation into the case and concealed its results. 
					
					 The people will never allow the revival of the habitual repressive acts dating back to the era of the Park Chung-Hee regime, they warned.
					
					 They demanded the authorities immediately remove from office those who disturbed the investigation and stop actions going against the times.

articles.title: Acquittal of Those Related to Case of UPP Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Acquittal of Those Related to Case of UPP Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime held the first trial of those related to the case of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) at the Suwon District Court on Nov. 12.
					 The Measure Committee to Denounce the Intelligence Service's Fabrication of Plotted Rebellion and Suppression under the Pretext of Security consisting of civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference outside the court and demanded an immediate release of those related to the case.
					
					 At the press conference speakers said that the prosecution's indictment is full of groundless assertions that to call for independence, democracy and reunification means following the north and an attempt at a rebellion.
					
					 They condemned the conservative media for describing even mountaineering in winter as a drill in the coldest season.
					
					 Such things hardly imaginable with normal thinking and reason are taking place in south Korea, they deplored. 
					
					 They denounced Park Geun Hye for working hard to forcibly disband a progressive political party just as Park Chung-Hee did during the era of "yusin" dictatorship. Park Geun Hye should draw a lesson from the miserable end of Park Chung-Hee, they warned.
					
					 The case of the UPP was fabricated to conceal the election rigging, they said, urging the court to declare those related to the case not guilty and set them free.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee posted general secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Socialism Is a Science" on its website on November 3.
					 The work, made public on November 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the socialist theory of Juche is the most scientific and viable one. It also clearly explains the principled issues arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to be Remembered in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to be Remembered in Austria
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering general secretary Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Vienna on November 8.
					 The chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to introduce the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to be Remembered in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to be Remembered in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- An Ethiopian committee for remembering general secretary Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Addis Ababa on November 8.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to widely introduce the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela esencia reaccionaria de la "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela esencia reaccionaria de la "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios"
 Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico hoy el articulo de un comentarista que revela el contenido detallado y la esencia de la "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios", sofisma anti-reunificacion que presentan las autoridades surcoreanas como su politica sobre el Norte (de Corea).
					 El articulo va como sigue:
					
					 La "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios" de las autoridades surcoreanas es la teoria anti-reunificacion que niega totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta N-S del 15 de Junio y pretende volver a llevar las relaciones intercoreanas a la epoca de confrontacion.
					
					 Diciendo que las relaciones intercoreanas de hasta ahora fueron las "anormales" en que el Sur (de Corea) se dejaba llevar por el Norte siendo sometido y humillado por este, la banda titere surcoreana presenta como "principio" hacerlas "normales".
					
					 Sin dudas, las "relaciones anormales", mencionadas por ellos, significan los vinculos N-S que vinieron desarrollandose positivamente despues del 15 de Junio.
					
					 Hoy dia, las relaciones intercoreanas resultaron destruidas y cortadas debido a la cruel campana de confrontacion de la camarilla surcoreana.
					
					 Ocurrio por primera vez despues de la pasada guerra coreana el incidente de intercambio de fuego entre el Norte y el Sur y se ven amenazadas al extremo la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana al llegar al climax la crisis de guerra nuclear.
					
					 El anuncio de la transicion de la "anormalidad" a la "normalidad" no pasa de ser un sofisma anti-reunificacion y anacronico para darle marcha atras a la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio al tiempo de enfrentamiento.
					
					 La susodicha "doctrina" es la criminal teoria de confrontacion de regimenes que niega la tendencia a la reunificacion de las relaciones intercoreanas y persigue la division y el enfrentamiento.
					
					 Las relaciones Norte-Sur no son las entre un pais y el otro sino las especiales que se forman provisionalmente en el proceso de aspirar a la reintegracion territorial.
					
					 En ese contexto, el Norte y el Sur acordaron en conjunto hace mucho tiempo el caracter de relaciones intercoreanas y los principios, reglamentos y disciplinas convenientes.
					
					 Particularmente, las declaraciones intercoreanas aclaran totalmente los principios y los remedios para lograr el desarrollo de relaciones Norte-Sur, la reunificacion pacifica y la prosperidad comun de la nacion.
					
					 Entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, no puede haber ningun principio unilateral ni norma internacional aparte de la pauta, principios y normativa, acordados en conjunto por ambas partes coreanas, ni mucho menos la concepcion de las "relaciones de Estados normales".
					
					 La teoria de "relaciones de Estados normales segun la pauta internacional" de la banda titere es la nueva version de la criminal doctrina de "dos Coreas" preconizada por el dictador de "Yusin" (renovacion).
					
					 La "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios" destruye la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, agrava la tension y persigue la guerra de agresion al Norte.
					
					 Los titeres surcoreanos tratan de provocar la nueva guerra hablando de la "firme disposicion de seguridad", "solida alianza Sudcorea-EE.UU." y "fuerte disuasivo anti-Norte", por una parte, y por la otra, presenta la "intransigencia" y la "presion" como otro "principio sobre el Norte".
					
					 Las expresiones como "seguridad" y "disuasivo al Norte" son el pronombre de la confrontacion militar y la campana de guerra y un disfraz para encubrir su mala intencion agresiva.
					
					 Recurriendo a las maniobras de guerra de agresion al Norte, ellos suelen hablar de la "amenaza nuclear" y la "provocacion" de alguien en busca del pretexto de agresion, lo cual es una absurdidad que no puede persuadir a nadie.
					
					 Parte de la logica de bandido el hecho de que ellos cuestionan el justo disuasivo nuclear de la parte connacional defendiendo las armas nucleares de caracter agresivo del imperio yanqui y sus tentativas de guerra nuclear.
					
					 Lo que hizo el actual "poder" desde su aparicion fue llevar a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas y agravar el peligro de guerra con las maquinaciones de guerra de agresion al Norte, la conspiracion anti-RPDC y la represion contra las fuerzas pro-reunificacion.
					
					 Los hechos muestran fehacientemente que la "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios" es la teoria proyanqui y servil a grandes potencias, la  de confrontacion conflictiva y de guerra de agresion al Norte.
					
					 Es indudable que las relaciones intercoreanas nunca se mejoraran mientras que la banda titere surcoreana siga ateniendose a la "doctrina".
					
					 Los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria y el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" son el unico principio conjunto a tomar firmemente por ambas partes coreanas.

articles.title: ACNC comenta acto servil a Japon del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta acto servil a Japon del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En estos dias, causa gran indignacion de todos los coreanos el acto traidor de la banda titere del Sur de Corea, que amparo y reconocio el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva" de Japon.
					 Tal actitud surcoreana significa una tolerancia de los crimenes de guerra cometidos en el pasado por los imperialistas japoneses y un reconocimiento abierto de la ambicion de nueva agresion de los nipones.
					
					 Esto es un insulto a toda la nacion coreana que sufrio la verguenza por las bestias imperialistas japoneses y una accion traidora que autodenomina a si mismos como lacayos de los agresores.
					
					 La historia de agresion a Corea por el imperialismo japones no es la historia de la antiguedad.
					
					 Durante su dominacion colonial sobre Corea, los imperialistas japoneses reprimieron a bayonetas a los inocentes habitantes indefensos, saquearon atrozmente los recursos naturales de Corea y les privaron a los coreanos hasta sus apellidos y nombres.
					
					 Hasta ahora se oyen en esta tierra los llantos llenos de odio de las mujeres coreanas quienes fueron arrastradas por la fuerza como esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones.
					
					 Es un acto que deja de ser coreano el mismo proceder de tomar la mano del enemigo jurado, pais delincuente de guerra que elogia sin escrupulos a los autores de agresion, lejos de exigirle la disculpa y recompensas.
					
					 Hoy dia, el ejercicio del "derecho a autodefensa colectiva" de Japon produce gran preocupacion de la sociedad internacional, siendo una parte de las maniobras orientadas a realizar a toda costa el sueno de "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" no logrado en el pasado por los militaristas japoneses.
					
					 Sin embargo, la camarilla de Park Geun-hye no cuestiona la historia de agresion del pasado y los actos de usurpacion territorial de Japon, que dejo a la nacion coreana un resentimiento imborrable, y se suma sin vacilacion a las tentativas de guerra de agresion de las fuerzas extranjeras contra sus connacionales.
					
					 A traves de tales acciones de Park Geun-hye, que superan las de los "Cinco Traidores de Ulsa", toda la nacion coreana ve el renacimiento del dictador de "Yusin" (renovacion), "uniformado de ultimo imperio japones" y traidor vendepatria projapones quien escribio con su sangre su fidelidad al emperador japones.
					
					 Todos los coreanos no perdonaran nunca los actos antinacionales de la banda titere colmada de la idea de servilismo a Japon.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente palestino
 Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 25o aniversario de la proclamacion del Estado de Palestina, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 14 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente palestino Mahmoud Abbas.
					 En la misiva, el remitente hizo votos por la salud del destinatario y por nuevos exitos en el cumplimiento de la justa causa del pueblo palestino para fundar un Estado independiente con Kuds oriental con la capital.

articles.title: Delegado de RPDC apoya causa de pueblos de Palestina y otros paises arabes
articles.content:
Delegado de RPDC apoya causa de pueblos de Palestina y otros paises arabes
 Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea intervino el dia 8 durante el debate de la agenda "Informe del comite especial de investigacion sobre la violacion de derechos humanos de Israel contra los pueblos de Palestina y otros paises arabes en el territorio ocupado" en la reunion del 4o comite del 68o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					 El dijo que a pesar de la duradera atencion y esfuerzos de la sociedad internacional sobre la region del Medio Oriente, todavia no se acaban los actos de violacion de derechos humanos de Israel contra el pueblo palestino y los demas de los paises arabes.
					
					 Tales actos ya pasaron el limite y extienden al ataque militar encaminado a perjudicar la soberania y la integridad territorial del Estado soberano, destaco y prosiguio:
					
					 La violacion de soberania y derechos humanos de Israel se torna cada dia mas abierta bajo el amparo de Estados Unidos.
					
					 Hoy en dia, resolver cuanto antes el problema del Medio Oriente incluyendo el de Palestina, se presenta como un asunto urgente.
					
					 Dichos problemas deben resolverse conforme a los intereses del pueblo palestino y el resto de los paises arabes segun la ley internacional y las resoluciones de la ONU.
					
					 Antes que nada, segun la demanda de la sociedad internacional, Israel debe retirarse de inmediato de todo el territorio arabe ocupado y compensar todos los danos espirituales y materiales sufridos por los pueblos arabes incluyendo el palestino.
					
					 Solo de esta manera, el problema de Palestina se resolvera conforme al interes del pueblo palestino.
					
					 Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para expresar otra vez el apoyo y solidaridad con la justa causa del pueblo palestino por reivindicar los legitimos derechos nacionales incluyendo la fundacion del estado soberano con Kuds este como su capital y con la lucha de los pueblos arabes para resolver de manera pacifica e imparcial el problema de Medio Oriente.
